verses.roman:
parīkṣā karite tāṅra yabe icchā haila
bāhire rahiyā tabe vicāra karila

synonyms: parīkṣā karite—to test; tāṅra—of Śivānanda Sena; yabe—when; icchā—desire; haila—there was; bāhire rahiyā—staying outside; tabe—at that time; vicāra karila—considered.
translation: Desiring to test the authenticity of Nakula Brahmacārī, he stayed outside, thinking as follows.
